hookDescription: Manages the root state for a tooltip.

defaultOpen.description: If true, the tooltip will be open by default. Use when uncontrolled.

onOpenChange.description: Callback fired when the tooltip is requested to be opened or closed.

open.description: If true, the tooltip will be open. Use when controlled.

setMounted.description: Sets the mounted state of the tooltip.

setOpen.description: Sets the open state of the tooltip.

transitionStatus.description: The transition status of the tooltip.
